title: Between the Scenes - Trump Sends a $250 Million Message to Syria
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Trump Sends a $250 Million Message to Syria
description:
Trevor marvels at how Western nations are often stingy when it comes to foreign aid, yet perfectly willing to spend $250 million on a military strike.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
